title: Bad Company - In Concert: Merchants Of Cool (2002)
description:
In Concert: Merchants of Cool is a live album and DVD by British hard rock band Bad Company. It was recorded principally at The Paramount Theater, Denver, Colorado and The Grove of Anaheim, Anaheim, California, in January 2002. It features hits from both Bad Company and Free as well as two new studio tracks, "Joe Fabulous" and "Saving Grace".
